intro: Catch up to the ultra-fast Rapid Express!Freely drive 10-car trains in the latest, enhanced Train Plus title!No scores, no game over—just pure free driving fun!
description:
The hugely popular fictional railway Shinise Private Railway, with over 1 million total views on YouTube, finally arrives as a full game!
Explore and freely operate trains across the expansive Southern Line, featuring all 10 stations from the series.

In Free Drive Mode, there are no scores and no forced stops—control everything your way. Stop or skip stations, open and close doors, switch to a free camera, and enjoy complete freedom in how you drive.

Prefer watching instead of driving? In Auto Drive Mode, trains run automatically while you enjoy the scenery from any angle. Witness Rapid and Rapid Express services running side-by-side!

Play station announcements, use the free camera to watch passing trains, ride alongside fast-moving express trains, and immerse yourself in a world full of freedom and detail. Blow the horn, play departure melodies, and experience authentic railway atmosphere—right down to the small gestures like sounding the whistle when closing the doors.


Enjoy a brand-new style of train-driving simulation to your heart’s content!

This title is not affiliated with any real-world railway companies.
